_header: Now Jesu Christ for Thy dearworth blood
_description: A homily on the Ten Commandments — twenty quatrains

BLHar913.First Lines:
Nou ihesu for þi derworþ blodeþat þou schaddist
                    for to man kynȜit vs grace to wirch workis godeto heuen þat
                    we mot entir in…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…be sech we him mild and modeþat sok þe milk of maid
                    is brestþat boȝt vs wiþ is der blodȜiue vs euer in
                    heuen rest
BLHar913.Note: Two verse lines per manuscript line.
BLHar913.Editions:

             Altenglische Sprachproben, I: Poesie.
         Berlin: Wiedmann, 1867: 1.128.
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             Die Kildare-Gedichte…
Bonner Beiträge zur Anglistik
         14. Bonn: P. Hanstein, 1904: 114-16.
